application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details pursuant to ref: 17/01178/FUL: Drainage Plan/SuDs (14), Construction Management Plan (24), Construction Site Waste Management Plan (25), for the formation of outdoor educational facility comprising ground works to form a nature reserve/ecological enhanced area together with erection of a single storey detached building with basement for education, sports and leisure uses, a 4-pitch Multi Use Sports Pitch with spectator stands and floodlighting, associated car parking and ancillary works.
site_name: Land To The South Of Whitewebbs Lane & West Of Hotspur WayEnfieldEN2 9AP
